title: The Auditor's Report Domain Schema
description: Contains information about the different audits made to the company

AuditsList.title: List of Auditor's Reports or Audits

Period.title: Period for the audit
Period.description: Period of time (yearly in most cases) of the accounts audited

MandatoryAudit.title: Mandatory Audit
MandatoryAudit.description: True if the company is required to have its financial statements audited

AuditorCompany.title: Auditor's Company
AuditorCompany.description: Name of the company which undertook the audit

AuditorEntityId.title: Auditor's Entity Id
AuditorEntityId.description: Internal Entity Id of the company which undertook the audit

Auditor.title: Auditor's name
Auditor.description: Name of the person who lead the audit process

Date.title: The day that the auditor's report was signed

Opinion.title: Auditor's Opinion (enum)
Opinion.description: Result of the audit according to auditor's opinion

TrOpinion.title: Auditor's Opinion (translateable)
TrOpinion.description: Result of the audit according to auditor's opinion

Comments.title: Auditor's Comments
Comments.description: Any detailed comments about the opinion expressed by the audit, both positive or negative

AuditCost.title: Audit Cost
AuditCost.description: Cost of the services hired concernig the audit

AuditVendorReferenceId.title: Audit Vendor Reference Id
AuditVendorReferenceId.description: External Id used to point to the source reference of the Auditor's Report

AuditPageNumber.title: Source page
AuditPageNumber.description: Page number where the specific info about the Report was published
